name: Sirdab
headline: Cloud warehousing & supply chain platform in MENA
description: Sirdab is a tech-ops focused startup offering cloud warehousing and transportation / logistics solutions. We have built an end-to-end logistics platform that allows businesses to acquire dry, ambient, chilled and frozen warehousing space within 48 hours as well as manage, optimize and distribute inventory via a single platform.

### **Transport**
Move goods to and from warehouse within and between citiesWide variety of vehicles to meet any use-case
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/675b016544b449a171106aac_icon-warehouse-1.svg)
### **Store**
Dry, ambient, chilled, and frozen warehouses for monthly or long-term storageLicensed for various uses-cases and sectors (food, medical, cosmetics, hazardous materials)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/675b0166291d51d8959273b0_icon-custom-clearance-1.svg)
### **Clear Customs**
Customs clearance at all ports of entry in the KingdomContinuous support from when your shipment leaves supplier till arrival at warehouse

Straightforward steps to get your space and optimize your supply chain

## Pick up
### We will arrange pickups and supplier drop-offs of your items
Our team will handle all of your logistics needs from and to our warehouses 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/62b8c0d7009ec680fe8b8be4_img-arrange-1.svg)
## Store
### We'll store it safely
Our team will assist in selecting the most ideal locations for storing your inventory whether it is dry, ambient, chilled or frozen
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/62b8c15e8e2a46457d018f4f_img-monitor-1.svg)

### Manage and analyze your inventory through Sirdab portal 
Through our portal, you will be able to view inventory levels and weekly consumption by SKU, inbounds and outbounds activities 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/62bc92190dd247f5849eeb4d_img-manage-2.svg)

### Distribute your inventory with a click of a button
Distribute your inventory to branches, request LTL freight and manage deliveries to consumers, all through one platform

## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
Get common questions answered below.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/62af9b9de7f763b6ac65c575_icon-plus.svg)
What is Sirdab?
Sirdab is a tech-ops focused startup offering on-demand warehousing and transportation / logistics solutions. We have built an end-to-end logistics platform that allows our clients to manage, optimize and distribute their inventory via a single dashboard.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/62af9b9de7f763b6ac65c575_icon-plus.svg)
What industries does Sirdab serve?
Sirdab serves SMEs in the retail, consumer goods, food and beverage, entertainment, and industrial and manufacturing industries. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/62af9b9de7f763b6ac65c575_icon-plus.svg)
Do you provide transportation and logistics services?
Yes, we provide all kinds of transportation you might need to move your goods.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/62af9b9de7f763b6ac65c575_icon-plus.svg)
Do you deliver outside of Riyadh?
Yes, we deliver to all cities within Saudi Arabia, and soon beyond.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/62af9b9de7f763b6ac65c575_icon-plus.svg)
What can I store with Sirdab?
Any dry, chilled or frozen goods. We got you covered across all.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/62af9b9de7f763b6ac65c575_icon-plus.svg)
Where are your warehouses located?
We are available in 80+ locations in Saudi Arabia covering 9 different cities. Our team will assist you with identifying the right warehouse based off your needs.
## Talk to an expert
Get your space and optimize your supply chain

## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
Get common questions answered below.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/62af9b9de7f763b6ac65c575_icon-plus.svg)
What is Sirdab?
Sirdab is a tech-ops focused startup offering on-demand warehousing and transportation / logistics solutions. We have built an end-to-end logistics platform that allows our clients to manage, optimize and distribute their inventory via a single dashboard.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/62af9b9de7f763b6ac65c575_icon-plus.svg)
What industries does Sirdab serve?
Sirdab serves SMEs in the retail, consumer goods, food and beverage, entertainment, and industrial and manufacturing industries. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/62af9b9de7f763b6ac65c575_icon-plus.svg)
Do you provide transportation and logistics services?
Yes, we provide all kinds of transportation you might need to move your goods.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/62af9b9de7f763b6ac65c575_icon-plus.svg)
Do you deliver outside of Riyadh?
Yes, we deliver to all cities within Saudi Arabia, and soon beyond.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/62af9b9de7f763b6ac65c575_icon-plus.svg)
What can I store with Sirdab?
Any dry, chilled or frozen goods. We got you covered across all.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9492664989829af2005d9/62af9b9de7f763b6ac65c575_icon-plus.svg)
Where are your warehouses located?
We are available in 80+ locations in Saudi Arabia covering 9 different cities. Our team will assist you with identifying the right warehouse based off your needs.
## Talk to an expert
Get your space and optimize your supply chain

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Sirdab**

Sirdab is an innovative startup based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, that focuses on transforming the logistics landscape in the MENA region. Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's W23 batch, Sirdab aims to revolutionize how businesses manage their supply chains. On its end-to-end logistics platform, businesses can easily acquire warehousing space—whether dry, chilled, or frozen—within 48 hours and efficiently manage, optimize, and distribute their inventory all from a single dashboard.

### Mission and Services
Sirdab's mission revolves around providing cutting-edge cloud warehousing and supply chain solutions that streamline logistics operations for businesses. Their platform supports a range of sectors, including retail, consumer goods, food and beverage, and manufacturing.

Some key services they offer include:
- **Warehousing**: Access to a vast network of over 800,000 square meters of storage space across various temperature zones, catering to specific industry needs (food, medical, cosmetics, etc.).
- **Transportation**: Comprehensive logistics solutions, enabling movement of goods within and between cities using a diverse fleet tailored to different requirements.
- **Customs Clearance**: Assistance with customs procedures at all ports of entry in Saudi Arabia, ensuring seamless logistics from suppliers to warehouses.

### Growth and Impact
Since its inception, Sirdab has demonstrated impressive growth, currently facilitating logistics solutions for over 900 active businesses across 80+ locations in Saudi Arabia. Their unique approach allows users to manage everything from inventory analysis to distribution at the click of a button. 

### Team and Leadership
With a lean team passionate about leveraging technology to improve logistics, Sirdab benefits from the guidance of Dalton Caldwell, their Group Partner at Y Combinator. The company prides itself on its commitment to customer service, ensuring clients receive continuous support as they navigate their logistics needs.

### Conclusion
Sirdab is not just about warehousing and logistics; it’s about creating a smarter, more efficient supply chain ecosystem. If you’re a business in the MENA region looking to optimize your logistics, Sirdab might just be the partner you need to elevate your operations.

For more information, you can visit their website at [sirdab.co](https://sirdab.co/en).
